erjang.driver
Class EDriverTask

java.lang.Object
  kilim.Task
      erjang.ETask<EInternalPort>
          erjang.driver.EDriverTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
NIOHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
EExecDriverTask, EFDDriverTask, ESpawnDriverTask
public abstract class EDriverTask
extends ETask<EInternalPort>
implements NIOHandler

Base class for the two kinds of driver tasks: drivers, and "exec"s
